title: Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 404 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
April 15, 2014

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on S. 404




On Tuesday, April 15, 2014, the President signed into law:
S. 404, the "Green Mountain Lookout Heritage Protection Act," which clarifies that a specified wilderness area does not preclude the operation and maintenance of the Green Mountain Lookout in the Mount Baker-Snoqualmie National Forest in Washington; and directs the Secretary of the Interior to issue aÂ patent for an Alaska Native Veteran Allotment located in the Yukon-Delta National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.
